Zurro Station Aufgabe:

curl -XPOST http://10.255.255.254:2009/set_target --data '{"target": {"x": -6792, "y": 6032}}'

curl -XPOST http://10.255.255.254:2029/receive

curl -XPOST http://10.255.255.254:2009/set_target --data '{"target": {"x": -1000, "y": 1000}}'

curl -XPOST http://10.255.255.254:2030/put_message --data '{"sending_station": "Zurro Station", "base64data": ""}'
